input_schema.description: A cat photograph to evaluate for overall harmony — whether light, space, color, and subject feel unified in one coherent image where the cat belongs naturally as the focal point.

description: Scores how well a cat photograph's lighting and environment support the cat as a subject. Evaluates lighting effectiveness on the cat's features, background cleanliness and distraction level, and the overall harmony between the cat and its visual surroundings. Rewards clarity and coherence over beauty or prestige.

input_schema.description: A cat photograph to evaluate for light and environment — whether the lighting reveals the cat effectively and the background supports the subject without distraction.
